package.name: kuka_resources

description.p: Shared resources for KUKA manipulators within ROS-Industrial.
This package contains common urdf / xacro resources used by KUKA robot support packages within the ROS-Industrial program.

package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
